text: ( Source : Fitch Inc) 20 Oct 2015 4:30 PM GMT / UTC Fitch Ratings-New York /Sao Paulo-20 October 2015 : As a reduction in federal tax collections takes hold, Brazil 's fiscal pressures may prompt budget imbalances for states with the greatest
